description:
The Shediac Fishing Lobster Crewneck pays tribute to the finer things about New Brunswick: its people, its rivers, its hospitality, its fishing community and not so surprisingly, its delicious lobster!

Made from 60% recycled polyester and 40% organic cotton, our crewneck is comfortable and soft, perfect for those outdoor cooking evening. Inspired by this seaside town along New Brunswick's east coast, our embroidered illustration designed by Dan Sheridan lives up to the world's largest representation of a lobster!
name: Hooke Fishing Lobster Crewneck - Mens
